amendment.description: To require the reporting of certain information relating to proposed exports and transfers of firearms.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1155 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1155 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Biden to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9162-9166; text: CR S9163-9164) To require the reporting of certain information relating to proposed exports and transfers of firearms.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1155 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Biden to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1155 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
